$.+@.+^.description: Node-specific settings - these take highest precedence
$.+@.+^.name: node

$[a-zA-Z0-9.]+^.description: Zone-specific settings - these are checked if a node-specific setting is not defined
$[a-zA-Z0-9.]+^.name: zone
